title: Doctor Story, Carla Anniversary, Omarosa Question, VMA's, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Simone Biles, Tiger Woods, Colombia, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Doctor Story, Carla Anniversary, Omarosa Question, VMA's, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Simone Biles, Tiger Woods, Colombia, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The show opens and J. Anthony Brown sings. Steve has a special scan during his visit to the doctor. Omarosa is being questioned for her present behavior. The MTV VMA's went down last night. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Steve VS Tommy. Win Lose or Draw. Simone Biles takes all the gold. Tiger Woods is being offered a helping hand from a well know adult establishment. A health official in Colombia has a questionable suggestion. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve does a very special dedication to all the dads who be putting in work and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
